title: 4k support
body: It's hard to belive that this game doesn't support 4k. Please add 4k support.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Higher resolutions tend to "break" the game in terms of giving players who utilise them an "unfair" advantage.

The amount you can view is kind of tied to the resolution/aspect ratio, thus this would cause issues.

You can however edit your game.cfg file (LeagueOfLegends/config) to set your game to a higher resolution, keep in mind however that modifying any files is at your own risk.
